South Africa defended the lowest total in a T20 match.
It is the lowest target Bangladesh have failed to chase in a T20.
South Africa leads 9-0 in head-to-head T20 matches against Bangladesh.
Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller set a record 79-run fifth-wicket stand for South Africa in T20Is.
Tanzim Hasan achieved his career-best figures of 3 for 18 in four overs, the best figures by a Bangladesh seamer against South Africa and the second-best overall.
Klaasen-Miller set NY partnership record with a 79-run stand, the highest fifth-wicket stand at Eisenhower Park and South Africa's highest fifth-wicket stand in T20Is.
